page.title: 07Newport Cattle Market
page.content: {Newport Cattle Market}is found in the Stafford Road, and is open every Monday. Although the local{farming} community use this market, business has declined in recent years. {Livestock}sold includes cattle,pigs, sheep and sometimes polultry. Although the animals arrive in the middle of the morning,{auctioning}time varies depending upon the weather and the number of animals. All livestock sold is killed for meat but no slaughtering takes place in Newport. The animals are weighted on a{weighbridge}.The price of the meat is fixed at so much per kilo and the animal has a sticker placed on it's body to show it's weight.
